Node.definition: = a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language
= action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a certain quantity that fill a certain container
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans
= object which derives from or comes from another object, used for plants and, by extension, for humans
= process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

= causative actions by which humans set someone or something irrevocably apart for a deity, ► as a result of which people and animals are to be put to death, cities are to be destroyed, and other objects are to be set apart for the service of that deity
= causative action by which humans kill other humans like an animal, with a sharp bladed instrument; ≈ associated with anger, power, callousness (of the killer), and helplessness (of the victim)
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object
= body of an animal or human that has died or been killed; ► source of pollution and impurity
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which an activity increases in intensity
= process by which dead animals, plants, or wounds give off a foul odor; ≈ considered repulsive
literally: to melt; hence: = process by which liquids flow from an object as if the object itself is melting away
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

Node.gloss: to waste away|to fall apart|to dissolve
Node.definition: = process by which objects slowly lose their inner coherence and disappear from existence

Node.gloss: host of heaven|sun, moon, and stars
Node.definition: = collective of all celestial bodies that give light; ◄ created by God; ► often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; ≈ in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= causative action by which humans turn a flat object over and over on itself to form a cylindrical shape
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: host of heaven|sun, moon, and stars
Node.definition: = collective of all celestial bodies that give light; ◄ created by God; ► often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; ≈ in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God

= process by which plants and their products become devoid of moisture, and therefore lose color and bend over ► which may ultimately result in death if circumstances do not change; ≈ associated with drought and destruction, often as punishment from God

= process by which plants and their products become devoid of moisture, and therefore lose color and bend over ► which may ultimately result in death if circumstances do not change; ≈ associated with drought and destruction, often as punishment from God

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness

= process by which plants and their products become devoid of moisture, and therefore lose color and bend over ► which may ultimately result in death if circumstances do not change; ≈ associated with drought and destruction, often as punishment from God

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to fall down|to sink down|to descend
Node.definition: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

Node.gloss: something devoted to God|something devoted for destruction
Node.definition: = state of having been set irrevocably apart for God; ► as a result of which people and animals are to be put to death, cities are to be destroyed, and other objects are to be set apart for the service of God
= action by which humans or deities carry out a verdict pronounced against an individual or group
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= process by which an object becomes covered with fat
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a young male sheep
= dominant male goat in a צֹאן (צֹאן) ≈ associated with authority
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

= either of a pair of relatively small organs in the abdominal cavity of humans and animals; ≈ regarded as a delicacy and usually burned along with the fat of an animal sacrifice on the altar; considered the seat of emotions and one's devotion to God; in its literal sense only used for animals

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= town; ◄ capital of Edom (אֱדֹום)
= causative action by which humans kill animals by slicing the jugular vein and windpipe with a sharp bladed instrument, ► to prepare its meat for a meal; ≈ associated with aggression
= state in which an event has a high intensity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)

Node.gloss: to go down (to the netherworld)|to die
Node.definition: literally: to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = process by which humans die and descend into the world of the dead
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a wild, untamable animal with horns, and very strong; perhaps wild ox, buffalo, or rhinoceros; ≈ symbol of strength, wildness, and power
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= powerful person ◄ compared with a bull; ≈ associated with power, authority, and/or aggression

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness
= process by which a substance becomes mixed with fat

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= process by which humans, deities, or objects take on a different nature, character, or form
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= tarlike substance, ◄ naturally derived from petroleum, ► and used to make objects watertight
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

= a pale yellow substance which burns readily in air; ◄ it is found in regions of vulcanic activity such as the Dead Sea area, and ► causes land to be infertile; ≈ it is associated with punishment from God

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= tarlike substance, ◄ naturally derived from petroleum, ► and used to make objects watertight
= process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= during the daytime
= process by which a fire comes to an end, either in a natural way or by force
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time

Node.gloss: to be destroyed|to lie in ruins
Node.definition: = state in which land, constructions, or towns have been totally of destroyed, including the people living there, to the extent that sedentary life is no more possible there
poetic term: = an extremely long duration of time that is or may seem unending, usually in the future
poetic term: = an extremely long duration of time that is or may seem unending, usually in the future

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions
exact meaning unsure: = relatively small black bird; ► unclean; ≈ associated with loneliness, devastation, destruction, and possibly death
meaning unsure: = kind of owl

exact meaning unknown; possibly: type of owl with a mottled gray brown color; its eyes are outlined with pale circles, so that it looks as though it is wearing spectacles; it prefers wooded areas or orchards and roosts close to the trunk of a tree; ◄ Strix aluco; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten

= a large black bird with a thick strong beak, and fairly short legs; it is highly intelligent and seems to enjoy flying; it eats almost anything, including grain, fruit, insects, lizards, frogs, eggs, nestlings, and the meat of dead animals; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ its black color is regarded as beautiful

Node.gloss: to stretch out a measuring line
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out a measuring line (over something); hence: = action by which humans or deities determine the measurements of an area as part of a construction or demolition job
= line ► used for measuring the size of an object; ≈ sometimes used in a figurative sense in the context of moral and ethical standards
= location that is devoid of any life and without any structure or order

Node.gloss: to stretch the plummet of chaos over (something) > to reduce (something) to chaos
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out the plummet of chaos over something; hence: = to reduce a land to destruction, ◄ as if it were meticulously planned and methodologically executed with the help of a plummet
= location that is devoid of any life and without any structure or order; ≈ used exclusively in a word pair together with its rhyming synonym תֹּהוּ (תֹּהוּ)
= person; ◄ belonging to the social class of the nobility ► and therefore often found in a position of authority; ≈ usually treated with respect

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= state of being non existent, implying that an existing object has been destroyed, or that an object exists in people's imagination only; ≈ regarded therefore as totally insignificant
literally: to go up; hence: = process by which an object appears on top of or over another one
= building or part of a building that has been fortified to provide additional security; often connected to the palace

exact meaning unsure: = thorny plant, ◄ possibly Sarcopoterium spinosum or Thorny or Spiny Burnet; ► known for making a crackling sound when burning, for overgrowing an entire building when no longer in use, and for being so entangled that they are impenetrable
= thorny plant ► considered to be a weed; ≈ associated with neglect and desolation
= plant with thorns; ► useless; ≈ regarded as ugly and useless
= area that has been fortified with the help of a strong and solid wall and possibly other defense works; ≈ associated with security

= animal looking like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose; yellowish brown in color with red tips to the fur on the back and a bushy tail; produces mournful sounds; ≈ used mainly in poetry and associated with death, destruction, and devastation, but also with mourning and weeping
probably related to חָצֵר (חָצֵר) but used figuratively: = location; ► used as dwelling place by animals
see יַעְַנָה (יַעֲנָה)

exact meaning unknown; probably: = a type of owl, large, standing over 75 centimeters (30 inches) tall; it has a pale fawn color, is spotted, has ear tufts, and is best known by its loud, deep hooting at night; it roosts by day in deep shade in acacia trees, caves, tombs, and ruined buildings; it feeds on small mammals, including hares, baby gazelles, lambs, rats and mice, and large roosting birds, especially wild and domestic ducks; ◄ Bubo bubo; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten
= animal or animal like creature, usually found in desert areas, ► that are hostile to humans; ≈ possibly associated with demons

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
exact meaning unsure: = animal ≈ associated with death, destruction, and devastation
= supernatural beings shaped like goats
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= particle limiting the focus to one phrase and so enhancing its truth value
= process by which animals or objects in motion stop moving

exact meaning unknown; possibly another name for the tawny owl (יַנְשֹׁוף) or: = type of owl with tiny ears that is a mottled gray in color; by day it perches close to the trunk of a tree, where its mottled coloring blends in with the tree bark, making the owl look like the stump of a broken branch; it has a soft, trilled call; ≈ associated with demons
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= a place where humans or animals can find rest after a time of activity

= causative action by which birds build a nest (קֵן) ◄ with the help of twigs, straw, grass and other materials, ► as a place where they can lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security
meaning unsure: = kind of owl
= causative process by which an animal keeps its egg(s) warm for a prolonged period until the shell breaks open and a young animal comes out
= to sit upon eggs for a prolonged period ► in order to provide the warmth that is needed for the eggs to hatch at the proper time
= particle limiting the focus to one phrase and so enhancing its truth value

Node.gloss: to come together|to gather|to assemble|to rally|to (re)unite
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

exact meaning unknown, possibly: = dark brown bird with a grayish head and a long triangular tail that looks V shaped as it maneuvers the two outer feathers; ◄ Milvus migrans; ► it feeds on insects, frogs, lizards, and food scraps from human dwellings, and scavenges dead fish and shellfish along the beaches of oceans, lakes, and rivers; they also pick off small bits of meat from animal carcasses; unclean and therefore not to be eaten
= referent to each member of a group of objects of the feminine grammatical gender
= female person with whom someone has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= action by which humans or deities make an intensive effort to obtain in depth information about a certain object or event
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans speak written words aloud
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= referent to each member of a group of objects of the feminine grammatical gender
= female person with whom someone has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= process by which humans or animals notice that someone or something that is expected to be present or available is missing
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to let lots fall; hence: = causative action by which humans throw lots in order to select individuals or groups from among a large group
= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= causative action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= line ► used for measuring the size of an object; ≈ sometimes used in a figurative sense in the context of moral and ethical standards
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
